name: Flight of the Argonaut
description:
Flight of the Argonaut takes the space strategy genre and brings it into virtual reality. Instead of having a view of the entire playing field, the player’s view is limited to what they can see from the bridge of their station. To succeed, the player must command their fleet and destroy waves of enemy ships.

Instructions:

Move - Move around the bridge using the Left and Right Joysticks.

Select ships - Hover over allied ships with the laser pointer, press A.

Move ships - After selecting a ship, point to desired destination and press A.

The Crew:

Lead Designer - Dan Bohrman

Assistant Designer - Axen Georget

Programmers - Jared Long, Marcus Olsen, Arthur Ulpat
